lightwave_auth_method.title: Lightwave Smart Configuration
lightwave_auth_method.description:
Choose your authentication method.

**Note:** Both 'Refresh Token' and 'Password Authentication' require a password. 'Refresh Token' however does not store your password and is preferred over 'Password Authentication'

data_description.instance_name: Optional, your username will be used if not provided

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Lightwave Smart - Password Authentication Configuration

oauth_auth_method.title: Lightwave Smart - Account Linking Configuration
oauth_auth_method.description: You will be redirected to Lightwave to authorize the integration. Once authorized, you will be redirected back to Home Assistant to complete the setup.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Lightwave service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid credentials. Please check your username and password.
error.invalid_auth_method: Invalid authentication method. Please select a valid authentication method.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.unique_id_mismatch: A different username was given, the original username is required. Please enter the original username or delete the integration and try again.
abort.single_instance_allowed:
Only one instance of the Lightwave Smart integration is allowed.
Please raise an issue if more than one is required.
